INSTRUCTIONS ============================================================

INFO ====================================================================

Title: Borderlands 2
Genre: Action, RPG
Developer: Gearbox Software 
Publisher: 2K Games     
Release Date: 21 Sep 2012
Languages: English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Spanish, Korean

About the Game:
A new era of shoot and loot is about to begin. Play as one of four new 
vault hunters facing off against a massive new world of creatures, psychos
 and the evil mastermind, Handsome Jack. Make new friends, arm them with 
a bazillion weapons and fight alongside them in 4 player co-op on a 
relentless quest for revenge and redemption across the undiscovered and 
unpredictable living planet.


GREETINGS ===============================================================

To the CS.RIN.RU community and all honorable groups!
